text: Thelma Colbert Schoonmaker (born January 3, 1940) is an Algerian-born American movie editor. She is known for working with director Martin Scorsese for over fifty years.Thelma Schoonmaker Profile , Turner Classic Movies Film Article; retrieved February 5, 2013. She started working with Scorsese on his first movie Who's That Knocking at My Door (1967), and edited all of Scorsese's movies since Raging Bull (1980). Schoonmaker has received seven Academy Award nominations for Best Film Editing, and has won three timesâ€”for Raging Bull (1980), The Aviator (2004), and The Departed (2006). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Academy Award winning editors Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American editors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Algiers
title: Thelma Schoonmaker
